data.eml:eml: A new species of the pontoniine shrimp genus Eupontonia (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae) from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Komai, Tomoyuki, Minemizu, Ryo (2014): A new species of the pontoniine shrimp genus Eupontonia (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Palaemonidae) from the Ryukyu Islands, Japan. Zootaxa 3784 (2): 171-178, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.2.6
